name: qorma
description: A custom editor for ORM files.

qorma.debugRendering.description: Enable debug rendering for qorma diagrams.

qorma.renderingOptions.opacity.shape.description: Sets the opacity of shapes when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.opacity.fact.description: Sets the opacity of facts when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.opacity.entity.description: Sets the opacity of entities when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.opacity.label.description: Sets the opacity of labels when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.opacity.objectifi.description: Sets the opacity of objectifications when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.opacity.uniquenes.description: Sets the opacity of uniqueness constraints when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.opacity.valueCons.description: Sets the opacity of value constraints when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.debugDot.shape.description: Sets whether a debug dot is drawn at the center of shapes when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.debugDot.fact.description: Sets whether a debug dot is drawn at the center of facts when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.debugDot.entity.description: Sets whether a debug dot is drawn at the center of entity when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.debugDot.label.description: Sets whether a debug dot is drawn at the center of label when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.debugDot.objectif.description: Sets whether a debug dot is drawn at the center of objectifications when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.debugDot.uniquene.description: Sets whether a debug dot is drawn at the center of uniqueness constraints when debug rendering is enabled.

qorma.renderingOptions.debugDot.valueCon.description: Sets whether a debug dot is drawn at the center of value constraints when debug rendering is enabled.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
